```{r data read in, inlcude=FALSE}
wildschwein<- read_delim("wildschwein_BE_all_raw.csv",",") 
schreckagenda<-read_delim("schreckagenda_2014-2017.csv", ",")

summary(wildschwein$speed)

devtools::install_github("ComputationalMovementAnalysis/ComputationalMovementAnalysisData")
head(wildschwein_BE)
wildschwein_BE<-wildschwein_BE
```
```{r}
ggplot(wildschwein, aes(Long, Lat, colour = Tier))+
  geom_point()

ggplot(wildschwein, aes(ZeitpUTC,Tier)) +
  geom_line()

ggplot(wildschwein, aes(timelag)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 50) +
  lims(x = c(0,15000)) +
  scale_y_log10()


wildschwein %>%
  filter(year(ZeitpUTC)  == 2015) %>%
  ggplot(aes(ZeitpUTC,timelag, colour = Tier)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()

```
